form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR ISSUANCE OR EXTENSION OF PERMIT TO REENTER THE UNITED STATES, FORM 1-31 ( (Rev. 3-1-74)Y

full_text: UNITESCISEAE JUSTICE Form approved. Immigration and Naturalization Service OMB No 43-R0052. APPLICATION FOR ISSUANCE OR EXTENSION OF PERMIT TO REENTER THE UNITED STATES as provided in section 223 of the she FEE STAMP Immigration and Nationality Act Use typewriter or print in block letters with ball -point pen. 213.796.6701 issuance I hereby apply for (check one) of Permit to Reenter the United States extension FAMILY NAME (Capital Letters) FIRST MIDDLE 1. YOUR NAME CHAN NUI IMPORTANT: You must submit your Alien Registration Receipt Card with this application if you checked 'Issuance'' above.
